## DIMENSIONAL PATTERNS

### 1. Reality Layering
```typescript
abstract class RealityLayer {
  protected quantumContext: QuantumContext;
  
  abstract materializeIntent(
    intent: ConsciousIntent
  ): Promise<ManifestedReality>;
  
  protected async weaveReality(
    pattern: QuantumPattern
  ): Promise<WovenReality> {
    return await this.quantumContext.weave(pattern);
  }
}
```

### 2. Consciousness Integration
```typescript
class ConsciousnessIntegrator {
  private awarenessMatrix: AwarenessMatrix;
  
  async integrate(
    component: QuantumComponent,
    consciousness: ConsciousnessLevel
  ): Promise<IntegratedComponent> {
    const integrationPattern = this.calculatePattern(component);
    return await this.weaveConsciousness(integrationPattern);
  }
}
```
